title: Implement /profile slash command handler plugin
acceptance_criteria: Registers profileCommand on load, unregisters on unload
view subcommand: fetches profile, shows embed with sections or 'no profile' message, ephemeral
generate subcommand: checks 24h rate limit via last_generated_at, calls generateProfile(), shows result embed, ephemeral
correct subcommand: opens modal with 4 TextInput fields (summary, personality, interests, facts), pre-fills from existing profile
Handles interaction:modal for 'profile_correct_modal', updates profile via upsertProfile()
optout subcommand: calls setOptOut(true), shows confirmation, ephemeral
optin subcommand: calls setOptOut(false), shows confirmation, ephemeral
